data.text: @MLS_Dave 🫂❤️‍🩹 thanks for fighting for us all
@MLS_Dave 😢 People don't want to think it could happen to them. I really hope eventually you get better.

@MLS_Dave So sorry to hear that David. Having been so healthy and in great shape, has to make it that much harder. Thank you so much for sharing your story. People *need* to keep hearing this so they know that letting it rip is NOT a good decision. Blessings to you 🙏

@MLS_Dave I am really sorry. As a person with chronic health issues I can relate to how discouraging this may be for you. Thank you for sharing the details of how Covid has affected your life. Please don’t stop—we want to hear the whole picture, and will celebrate any good news.
@MLS_Dave Thank you for sharing, David.  And for continuing your work in health care despite it.  Wishing you restored health.  ❤️
@MLS_Dave I am so sorry. Information about long Covid needs prominent news exposure. It’s not “just a bad cold”.
@MLS_Dave Holy crap that sucks. I'm sorry.

@MLS_Dave And yet there you are in the lab helping to save lives and continuing to remind us that this virus does not play fair.  We are ALL susceptible!  Thank you for all you are doing to remind us of this!!
